#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	long long int arr[62]={0};
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t){
		string s;
		cin>>s;
		long long int i=0;
		for(i=0;i<s.size();i++){
			if(s[i]>='a' && s[i]<='z'){
				arr[s[i]-'a']++;
			}
			else if(s[i]>='A' && s[i]<='Z'){
				arr[s[i]-'A' +26 ]++;
			}
			else
				arr[s[i]-'0' +52 ]++;
		}
		sort(arr,arr+62);
		long long int temp=arr[61];
		long long int count=1;
		long long int notpossible=0;
		long long int temp2=0;
		for(int i=60;i>=0 && arr[i]>0;i--){
			if(arr[i]==temp){
				count++;
				continue;
			}
			if(temp-arr[i]>1){
				notpossible=1;
				break;
			}
			else{
				temp2++;
			}
		}
		if(notpossible){
			cout<<"NOT POSSIBLE";

		}
		else{
			if(temp2==1)
				cout<<"INCREMENT";
			else if(temp2==0)
				cout<<"SAFE";
			else if(count==1)
				cout<<"DECREMENT";
			else
				cout<<"NOT POSSIBLE";

		}
		cout<<"\n";
		for(int i=0;i<62;i++)
			arr[i]=0;
		t--;
	}
	return 0;
}
